casebody.data:
Sammie Ray Usher, Jr.
v.
The Charlotte-Mecklenburg Hospital Authority No. 293P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Sam McGee, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, James M. Roane, III, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Usher, Sammie Ray (Jr.). Chip Holmes, Attorney at Law, Jami J. Farris, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for The Charlotte-Mecklenburg Hospital Authority. Harold Holmes, Attorney at Law.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th of August 2016 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
